item.description: Excepted details Should i display the details of error message to calling party? It depends.If calling party cares the reason of error should do,or not. Now my calling party don’t care,but i try to display. Because i think it is convenient to debug in the subconsious. Yes,it is.But it brings more trouble at same time.As shown: class ZX(NotGet): def post(self,request)->JsonResponse: try: py_obj = json.loads(request.body) zx = zxorm() if zx.main(py_obj): return JsonResponse(self.
